ValidationRule.description: Requires the Intercall Operator Type on events created on or after 11/12/15 (to prevent issues with past events) for certain record types
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISBLANK(TEXT(Operator_Type__c)), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)>DATEVALUE("2015-11-11"), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Direct_Event', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Premium_Event', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Stand_Alone', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Gold_Event', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Platinum_Event', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Webinar_Subscription'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Intercall Operator Type is required for this record type. Please update the field and save again.
